sentences.cn: 亚特兰大比华盛顿更靠南。

sentences.en: Atlanta was only an hour's drive to the north.
sentences.cn: 开车往北仅1个小时就能到达亚特兰大。

sentences.en: Atlanta was voted the best city in which to locate a business by more than 400 chief executives.
sentences.cn: 逾400名行政总裁投票推选亚特兰大为最适宜开办公司的城市。

sentences.en: Every girl in Atlanta was knee deep in men, even the plainest girls were carrying on like belles.
sentences.cn: 亚特兰大的女孩子个个都有许多男人追求, 就连最不出色的也像美人一样被男人紧紧缠住.

sentences.en: He insisted we stop at a small restaurant just outside of Atlanta.
sentences.cn: 他坚持让我们在亚特兰大市外不远的一家小餐馆歇歇脚。

sentences.en: He was crowned champion after his fight in Atlanta.
sentences.cn: 亚特兰大拳赛后他获授予冠军称号.

sentences.en: His ambition was to win gold at the Atlanta Games in 1996.
sentences.cn: 他的志向是在1996年亚特兰大奥运会上夺取金牌。

sentences.en: I lingered on in Atlanta for a few days, spending much of my time with an artist friend.
sentences.cn: 我在亚特兰大又逗留了几天，大部分时候都和一位搞艺术的朋友在一起。

sentences.en: I will be in Atlanta for the next Olympics.
sentences.cn: 我将参加在亚特兰大举行的下届奥运会。

sentences.en: She then invited him to Atlanta to lecture on the history of art.
sentences.cn: 她于是邀请他去亚特兰大讲艺术史。

sentences.en: Significantly, the company recently opened a huge store in Atlanta.
sentences.cn: 值得注意的是，该公司最近在亚特兰大开了一家大型商店。

sentences.en: The 26th Olympiad took place in Atlanta, Georgia.
sentences.cn: 第26届奥运会是在佐治亚州的亚特兰大举办的。

sentences.en: The cen-tennial Olympics will be in Atlanta, Georgia.
sentences.cn: 百年奥运盛典将在佐治亚州亚特兰大举行。

sentences.en: The centennial Olympics will be in Atlanta, Georgia.
sentences.cn: 百年奥运盛典将在佐治亚州亚特兰大举行。
那名恐怖分子逃往亚特兰大。

sentences.en: The World Series between the Atlanta Braves and Toronto Blue Jays is tied at one game apiece.
sentences.cn: 世界系列赛上，亚特兰大勇士队和多伦多蓝鸟队双方各赢一场，战成平局。

sentences.en: They communicated at least once a day, and it was still late afternoon in Atlanta.
sentences.cn: 他们每周至少沟通一次，而此时在亚特兰大还是下午晚些时候。
我们已经搬到亚特兰大了。

trans.tran_cn: 亚特兰大（美国佐治亚州首府）
